Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Make-a-Wish Foundation did not apologize for sending Drake Bell to visit a terminally ill boy.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the Make-a-Wish Foundation apologized for the incident, when in fact it did not happen.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting false information and misrepresenting the events.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on fabricated information from a parody Twitter account.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Make-a-Wish Foundation made a mistake in sending Drake Bell instead of the rapper Drake, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is a hoax created by a parody Twitter account.
